name: Blue - Pixel Prototype Week 11
description:
Controls:

Arrows to see potential moves

Z to confirm move

X to reload level

Made in one week in Bennett Foddy's Pixel Prototype Studio class at NYU.

This week's theme: blue.  I tried to make a version of Threes/2048 that uses colors instead of numbers.  It turns out that's a whole can of worms.

Read more about the development here.
